title: Unemployment rate rises to 5.6% in May, female joblessness higher at 5.8%
description:
The rate of unemployment in the country, measured in monthly term, rose to 5.6% in May from 5.1% in April this year mainly due to seasonal variation, showed the government data released on Monday (June 16, 2025).

Earlier last month, the Ministry of Statistics & Programme Implementation released the...
